testcase.name: test_metadata_only_record
testcase.failure:
client = <FlaskClient <Flask 'invenio'>> search_clear = <OpenSearch([{'host': 'localhost', 'port': 9200}])> location = pytest-location headers = {'accept': 'application/json', 'content-type': 'application/json'}
def test_metadata_only_record(client, search_clear, location, headers): """Test record with files disabled.""" h = headers # Create a draft res = client.post( "/mocks", headers=h, json={"metadata": {"title": "Test"}, "files": {"enabled": False}}, ) assert res.status_code == 201 id_ = res.json["id"]
# Publish the record res = client.post(f"/mocks/{id_}/draft/actions/publish", headers=h) assert res.status_code == 202
# Check published files res = client.get(f"/mocks/{id_}/files", headers=h) assert res.status_code == 200 assert res.json["enabled"] is False assert "entries" not in res.json
# Edit the record res = client.post(f"/mocks/{id_}/draft", headers=h) assert res.status_code == 201
# Publish again > res = client.post(f"/mocks/{id_}/draft/actions/publish", headers=h) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

self = <FilesManager (enabled=False), src_files = <FilesManager (enabled=False) delete_extras = True
def sync(self, src_files, delete_extras=True): """Sync changes from source files to this manager.
The source files are fully mirrored with the destination files following the logic:
* same ObjectVersions are not touched * new ObjectVersions are added to destination * deleted ObjectVersions are deleted in destination * extra ObjectVersions in dest are deleted if `delete_extras` param is True Logic follows the bucket sync logic """ # TODO record file data is not synced self.default_preview = src_files.default_preview self.order = src_files.order
# Sync file additions/removals/changes if self.bucket.locked: raise BucketLockedError()
> _, changed_ovs = src_files.bucket.sync(self.bucket, delete_extras=delete_extras) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ E AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'sync'
delete_extras = True self = <FilesManager (enabled=False) src_files = <FilesManager (enabled=False)
